tasks.title: Complete Project Report
tasks.description: Finalize and submit the report for the project deadline next week.

tasks.title: Team Meeting
tasks.description: Organize and attend the team meeting to discuss progress and challenges.

tasks.title: Code Review
tasks.description: Conduct a review of the recent code changes made by the development team.

tasks.title: Client Feedback
tasks.description: Collect feedback from the client on the latest product prototype.

tasks.title: Server Maintenance
tasks.description: Perform scheduled maintenance on the server and check for system updates.

tasks.title: Bug Fixes
tasks.description: Fix critical bugs reported by QA in the current version of the application.

tasks.title: Marketing Campaign
tasks.description: Launch a new marketing campaign to promote the upcoming product launch.

tasks.title: Design New UI
tasks.description: Redesign the user interface for the dashboard to improve user experience.
